content: 5 sided virus pattern by angie waterman definitions slip_stitch = slip_stitch chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet begin with chain 5 slip_stitch to create a ring round 1 chain 3 19 double_crochet into ring slip_stitch to top of chain 3 20 double_crochet round 2 chain 4 double_crochet into next double_crochet stitch chain 1 repeat double_crochet chain 1 all around slip_stitch into 3rd chain of beginning chain 4 20 double_crochet 20 chain 1 pictured actual project spaces by angie waterman round 3 slip_stitch into first chain 1 space * chain 5 skip chain 1 space single_crochet into next chain 1 space chain 3 single_crochet into next chain 1 space chain 3** single_crochet into next chain 1 space repeat from * to ** 4 times slip_stitch into beginning of first chain 5 5 chain 5 spaces 10 chain 3 spaces round 4 chain 3 9 double_crochet into chain 5 space single_crochet into chain 3 space chain 3 single_crochet into next chain 3 space *10 double_crochet into chain 5 space single_crochet into chain 3 space chain 3 single_crochet into next chain 3 space** repeat from * to ** 3 times slip_stitch to top of chain 3 round 5 chain 3 into first double_crochet stitch double_crochet into next 9 double_crochet stitches *single_crochet into chain 3 space 10 double_crochet into next 10 double_crochet stitches single_crochet into chain 3 space** repeat from * to ** 3 times from this point you can follow traditional virus pattern to complete your project round 6 basically a repeat of round 2 double_crochet chain 1 round exception no chain 1 made after the tenth double_crochet round 7 basically a repeat of round 3 except this round creates your 2 - chain 5 spaces at each of the 5 corners and has 3 - chain 3 spaces created single_crochet are completed at every other chain 1 space with the exception of the 2nd chain 3 is in a space between 2 double_crochet round 8 is where i color changed to variegated and starts the actual 4 repeating rounds virus pattern found here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/virus-blanket courtesy of jonna mrartinez
